title: The annual New Year's celebration topic
content:
My traditional topic. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

So, have you been invented to any party, go to somewhere or anything?

Personally, nothing special in my case. I'm going to uncle's place with my parents. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: The annual New Year's celebration topic
content:
I'm tired I had to get up early the last days and work the whole day. No parties for me, I'm going to bed in a few hours.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamba.nl/storage/view/335/0/sn/Snow_Ball.gif[/img][img]http://www.jamster.com/s/jcw/img/logo_jamster_navi.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: Re: The annual New Year's celebration topic
content:
Some of my relatives came to my house for a New Years Eve party last night, drank lots of alcohol and almost set fire to a tree with their fireworks.

Much fun.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: The annual New Year's celebration topic
Happy new year 2007!
content:
Haha. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
Well, I'm back, it was fun.. Too bad my sister had shot all the fireworks with her friend while we were away.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!
